dcterms:creator: K. Erk
D. McCarthy
N. Gaylord
dcterms:description: The Usim dataset contains graded Usim judgments for word instances in different contexts, allowing for the estimation of semantic proximity based on contextual usage.
dcterms:title: Usim Dataset

dcterms:creator: D. McCarthy
R. Navigli
dcterms:description: The LexSub dataset consists of instances of target words in sentential context, hand-labeled with meaning-preserving substitutes, used for evaluating lexical substitution tasks.
dcterms:title: LexSub Dataset

dcterms:creator: G. Kremer
K. Erk
S. Pad√≥
S. Thater
dcterms:description: The Concepts in Context (CoInCo) corpus provides manually selected substitutes for all content words in sentences, used to extract additional training data for usage similarity prediction.
dcterms:title: Concepts in Context (CoInCo) Corpus

dcterms:creator: M. T. Pilehvar
J. Camacho-Collados
dcterms:description: The Word-in-Context (WiC) dataset provides pairs of contextualized target word instances for evaluating context-sensitive representations, framing in-context sense identification as a binary classification task.
dcterms:title: Word-in-Context (WiC) Dataset
